action.primary: Tonifies Qi, moistens the Lungs, generates Body fluids and dispels Phlegm

indications: Chronic disorders such as asthma, migraines, neuralgia impaired respiratory function and impaired gastrointestinal function characterized by Deficiency with nausea, vomiting, shortness of breath and chest congestion

action.primary: Clears Heat, eliminates toxins and reduces swelling and inflammation and alleviates pain

indications: Gastric and duodenal ulcers, hyperlipidemia, nodules, cystitis, and herpes zoster

contraindications: This herb has a mild sedative effect. Use caution when driving.
interactions: This herb has sedative, hypnotic and analgesic effects. It potentiates the sedative effect of barbiturates and reverses the effect of mescaline23,24,25.

notes: This herb may be mixed with water and applied topically for liver spots.
